info.title: Talkdesk
info.description: Talkdesk provides a better way for organizations to intelligently unlock the promise and potential of great customer experience with end-to-end cloud solutions. Connect to other external systems already supported by Microsoft to be able to execute actions in Talkdesk like create an agent, create a callback, get a user by email, etc. or trigger your own flows when a contact is created/updated, note is created, inbound call starts, etc. in Talkdesk.

post.description: Create a new agent in Talkdesk.

active.description: A boolean whether the agent is active or not.
active.title: Active

active.description: A boolean whether after call work is enabled or not for the agent.
active.title: Active

show.description: A boolean whether the inbound dispositions codes are to be shown or not.
show.title: Show

show.description: A boolean whether the outbound dispositions codes are to be shown or not.
show.title: Show

agent_ivr_enabled.description: A boolean whether agent's ivr is enabled or not.
agent_ivr_enabled.title: Agent ivr enabled

extension_number.description: Agent's extension number following the /\A\d+\z/ regex format.
extension_number.title: Extension number

enabled.description: A boolean whether the mood settings are enabled or not.
enabled.title: Enabled

mood_settings.description: Mood settings for the given agent.
mood_settings.title: Mood settings

outbound_caller_id.description: Outbound caller id for the agent. (>= 5 characters,<= 40 characters)
outbound_caller_id.title: outbound_caller_id

outbound_caller_id_selection_enabled.description: A boolean whether the outbound caller id selection is enabled or not.
outbound_caller_id_selection_enabled.title: Outbound caller id selection enabled

phone_number.description: The phone number associated to the agent. (>= 5 characters,<= 40 characters)
phone_number.title: Phone number

agents.description: An array of agent data to be used to create the agents.
agents.title: Agents

post.description: Create a new callback in Talkdesk.

contact_phone_number.title: Contact phone number

name.description: Identifier for the field, in the scope of the entire context.
name.title: Name

display_name.description: The field name as it is shown to the user
display_name.title: Display name

tooltip_text.description: A tooltip regarding the field, shown to the user
tooltip_text.title: Tooltip text

data_type.description: Data_type of an enumeration of possible values (these enums can imply validation of the 'value' field and detailed error responses will be provided for the fields we discard).
data_type.title: Data type
